SEARCH
Package main.dataBase

Class DatabaseConnection

java.lang.Object
main.dataBase.DatabaseConnection
public class DatabaseConnection extends Object
The DatabaseConnection class provides methods to interact with the database.

    • searchUsers

      public static List<User> searchUsers(String searchPattern) throws SQLException
      Searches for users in the database based on a search pattern.
      Parameters:
      searchPattern - the pattern to search for in the user's lastname, firstname, or email.
      Returns:
      a list of User objects that match the search pattern.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getBorrowedBooks

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Book> getBorrowedBooks(String email) throws SQLException
      Retrieves borrowed books from the database for a given user email.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of Book objects representing the borrowed books.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • loadBorrowedBooks

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Book> loadBorrowedBooks(String email) throws SQLException
      Load borrowed books for a user from the database.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user whose borrowed books are to be loaded.
      Returns:
      An observable list of borrowed books.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • loadBorrowHistory

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Book> loadBorrowHistory(String email) throws SQLException
      Load the history of borrowed books for a user from the database.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user whose borrowed book history is to be loaded.
      Returns:
      An observable list of borrowed book history.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
